posts.message:
Photoshop Updates : Save for web feature became "Legacy" and Adobe generator is the replacement.

Stephen Nielson: Senior product manager
"Going forward, we will no longer develop new features in Save for Web, which is why it now is labeled as “Legacy”. Don’t worry; no features have been removed from it and we know there are critical workflows that still require Save for Web. However, Save for Web does not support, for example, new Artboard documents."

https://blogs.adobe.com/crawlspace/2015/06/save-for-web-in-photoshop-cc-2015.html#comments
https://helpx.adobe.com/photoshop/using/generate-assets-layers.html
http://thenextweb.com/apps/2015/06/26/wheres-the-save-for-web-command-in-photoshop-cc-2015/

 #Web #UI #UX #design #photoshop #web_design #designers #adobe #Egypt #creativity #usability #features #marketing
posts.caption: blogs.adobe.com
posts.description: In Photoshop CC 2015, we made some minor changes to a very popular and beloved feature: Save for Web. This feature is used for many purposes, from preparing assets for a website to optimizing high-res photos to creating animated GIFs.
